root: ^Ochano: Who is this tiny human that disturbs my slumber?

c-1: ^ You: I am this Island's hero, Alex.
c-2: ^ You: I am Alex, oh great Ochano. Your humble servant.

why0: ^Ochano: Muahahaha! Alex, is it? What do you want?

c-1: ^ You: I want you to free all of the spirits that you've trapped on this island.
c-2: ^ You: I want you to free the human spirits that you've trapped on this island.
c-3: ^ You: I am here to appease you, dear Ochano.

why1: ^Ochano: Very well, hero. I applaud your bravery. What do you want?

c-1: ^I want you to free all the spirits that you've trapped on this island.
c-2: ^ You: I want you to free the human spirits that you've trapped on this island.
c-3: ^ You: I was told by a great wizard to appease you.

anger_ochano: ^Ochano: How dare you waste my time. I knew I should have destroyed this island a century ago... I guess it's not too late.
what0: ^Ochano: Freeing spirits requires a sacrifice. What will you give me?

c-0: ^ You: Ochano, I have nothing to give you, but you must free the spirits.
c-1: ^ You: I have this bone necklace that meant a lot to someone.
c-2: ^ You: I have this key is as old as your favourite sacrifice.

what1: ^Ochano: Freeing spirits requires a sacrifice. What will you give me?

c-0: ^ You: Ochano, I have nothing to give you, but you must free the spirits.
c-1: ^ You: I have this bone necklace that meant a lot to someone.
c-2: ^ You: I have this key is as old as your favourite sacrifice.

sacrifice_yourself: ^Ochano: Very well. You're the perfect sacrifice to appease me.
amuse_ochano: ^Ochano: Very funny, Alex. You don't sound like you're ready to talk with me yet.
free_all: ^Ochano: Very wonderful sacrifice. This did mean a lot to its previous owner. Thus, I shall do as you requested. ALL the island spirits are free.
^OCHANO FREES BOTH THE HUMAN AND THE EVIL SPIRITS.
free_humans: ^Ochano: Very wonderful sacrifice. This did mean a lot to its previous owner. Thus, I shall do as you requested. The human spirits living on the island shall be freed.
old_sacrifice: ^Ochano: Ah, you fool. The age of the sacrifice is not what makes it precious to me. But your words remind me of an old friend I must visit...
